mapper.select: select WNBS,count(WNBS) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" group by WNBS;

select 'total' as name, count(distinct SFZH) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" union all select 'czrs' as name, count(*) from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" where ZYJNXX_YW ='有' union all select 'raise' as name, count(*) from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" where ZYJNXX_YW ='有' and ZYJNXX_HZSJ is not null and isnumeric(ZYJNXX_HZSJ) = 1 and year(to_date(ZYJNXX_HZSJ)) = year(CURDATE())
select ZYJSZCXX_ZCMC as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" where ZYJSZCXX_ZCMC is not null and ZYJSZCXX_YW = '有' group by ZYJSZCXX_ZCMC order by count(*) desc;
select ZYJSZCXX_CJ as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" where ZYJSZCXX_ZCMC is not null and ZYJSZCXX_YW = '有' and ZYJSZCXX_CJ is not null group by ZYJSZCXX_CJ;
select ZYJNXX_ZSLB as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" where ZYJSZCXX_ZCMC is not null and ZYJSZCXX_YW = '有' and ZYJNXX_ZSLB is not null group by ZYJNXX_ZSLB;
select ZYJSZCXX_CJ as name,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" where ZYJSZCXX_ZCMC is not null and ZYJSZCXX_YW = '有' and ZYJSZCXX_CJ is not null group by ZYJSZCXX_CJ;
select 'czrs' as name, count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" where ZYJNXX_YW ='有' union all select 'not_czrs' as name, count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" where ZYJNXX_YW ='无'
select WHCD as name ,count(*) as num from "GP_SZZF_M"."RRCZJNSH" group by WHCD;
